help-file.title: REAPER
help-file.content:
The Reaper Necromancer is the most appealing to Undead followers. They have the innate ability that forces their pets into irreversible submission.
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 31st level: Unholy Alliance
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 31st level: 1h slashing
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 4th circle: Unmaking 8th circle: Doom blade 9th circle: Destroy Undead
